It seems to be an engagement ring. You wonder who it does belong? //Note: This questline ends here for now (version 0.5.5). Check in for future updates! :)// <p style="text-align:center"><<button 'Back' 'Inventory'>><</button>></p>//Coming soon.../ [[Back|previous ()]]//Coming soon.../ [[Back|previous ()]]You stop in surprise as you spot a familiar face down the corridor. You remember the man as the one who removed your gag during that sleepover dare. No need to be afraid, you sigh in relief. <b class="male">"Hello."</b> The man, with his unusually calm and pale eyes stops before you. He is so tall! You have to awkwardly look up to meet his face. <b class="male">"Are you on a quest again?"</b> He asks with a barely present, teasing smile. <b class="protagonist">"N-no..."</b> You shake your head. <b class="protagonist">"Not really. What about you?"</b> <b class="male">"If I told you that, I would have to kill you."</b> Your mouth parts in horror, a chill creeping up your spine. <b class="male">"Kidding!"</b> He finally says, laughter erupting from his lips. A subtle scent of burbon lingers in the air after each exhaled breath. <b class="male">"However, I don't have much time to talk. Sorry."</b> He moves past you, giving you a flirty smile before heading down the hallway. You can't help but blush and look down... <img class="center" src='media/bottle/note1.jpg' onclick="source.ShowSource(290)"/> Wait. What's that? You kneel down and pick up a piece of paper. You want to call after the man but he is long gone... There is a phone number scribbled on the little parchment. Your imagination is already running wild, curiosity taking its grip. ''//Hastily Written Note has been added to your inventory.//'' <p style="text-align:center"><<button 'Go home' 'HandlerIn'>><</button>></p> <div id="sources"></div> <<script>>setup.InventoryAddWithID (51)<</script>>\ <<set $RoomArray.delete ("eventNote")>>\Doppelklick auf diesen Absatz zum Bearbeiten.
